content_chunks.title: Personal Summary
content_chunks.content: Full Stack developer specializing in React.js, Material UI, and UX-driven design. Certified IBM Full Stack Development and Meta Front-End Specialization. Experienced in building responsive web applications, improving UI performance, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver exceptional digital experiences.

content_chunks.title: Barnamala Tech Experience
content_chunks.content: Full-Stack Developer at Barnamala Tech. Improved UI load speed and user satisfaction, automated deployment (reduced time by 40%). Skills: Next.js, React, Material UI, Python (Flask), MongoDB, AWS.

content_chunks.title: Hamro Chautari Experience
content_chunks.content: Junior Web Developer at Hamro Chautari. Boosted engagement by 25% through improved UI consistency. Skills: React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, PostgreSQL, AWS.

content_chunks.title: Bihani Tech Experience
content_chunks.content: Front-End Web Developer at Bihani Tech. Improved UI satisfaction by 35% with React.js and Bootstrap. Skills: JavaScript, React.js, Bootstrap, WordPress.

content_chunks.title: Adira Tech Internship
content_chunks.content: Web Developer Intern at Adira Tech. Debugged UI issues and supported Agile development. Skills: JavaScript, React.js, Bootstrap, WordPress.

content_chunks.title: Job Tracker Project
content_chunks.content: Built a job tracking platform with analytics dashboard and secure document management. Impact: 10+ active users, streamlined resume management.

content_chunks.title: PDFly Project
content_chunks.content: Developed PDF APIs for secure processing and file encryption. Impact: 100+ documents processed daily, improved user satisfaction by 45%.

content_chunks.title: SangeetX Project
content_chunks.content: Built a music streaming platform with admin dashboard. Impact: 50+ users, reduced admin time by 60%, improved media loading speed by 50%.

content_chunks.title: BrainiX Project
content_chunks.content: Led development of AI-powered LMS with real-time chat and Stripe payments. Impact: 300% engagement increase, 94.7% course completion rate.

content_chunks.title: Technical Skills
content_chunks.content: Frontend: React 19, Next.js 15, Tailwind CSS, Material UI, Typescript, Redux, JavaScript (ES6+). Backend: Node.js, Express, Python (Flask), REST APIs. Databases: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL. Cloud/DevOps: AWS (S3, EC2), Git/GitHub, CI/CD. UI/UX: Figma, Adobe XD, Responsive Design, Accessibility, Design Systems.

content_chunks.title: Soft Skills
content_chunks.content: Agile workflow, UX research, wireframing, prototyping, cross-functional collaboration.

content_chunks.title: Education
content_chunks.content: Bachelor of Information Technology, Victoria University Sydney, 2025, Sydney, Australia.

content_chunks.title: Career Goals
content_chunks.content: Short-term: Full-Stack Developer/Technical Lead role focusing on SaaS and AI-powered web applications. Long-term: Head of Engineering or Product Development in an AI/ML driven company.
